smart_contract:
from pyteal import *

def asset_transfer_contract():
    
    group_size_check = Global.group_size() == Int(1)

   
    txn_0_checks = And(
        Gtxn[0].type_enum() == TxnType.AssetTransfer,  
        Gtxn[0].asset_receiver() == Addr("CVEFVMGWLPFOGLQKO4BPXGAEOY3QQNCHV2I4TK7TFS7RKQM4AGUW74RLLM"),  
        Gtxn[0].asset_amount() == Int(100),  
        Gtxn[0].fee() <= Int(1000),
        Gtxn[0].asset_close_to() == Global.zero_address(),
        # Verifica che la fee sia ragionevole 
    )

  
    program = And(
        group_size_check,
        txn_0_checks
    )
    return program


if __name__ == "__main__":
    print(compileTeal(asset_transfer_contract(), mode=Mode.Signature, version=4))
